profile.name: Rick Sanchez
profile.title: Interdimensional Scientist & Inventor
about: Wubba lubba dub dub! ðŸ§ª I'm Rick â€” the smartest being in the infinite universes. With an IQ that makes Einstein look like a Jerry, I specialize in interdimensional travel, quantum physics, and turning myself into various objects (proudly invented the pickle transformation). Currently avoiding the Galactic Federation while conducting groundbreaking research in my garage laboratory.

I'm also the inventor of the iconic Portal Gun and countless other revolutionary devices that the bureaucrats at the Citadel are too narrow-minded to appreciate. Whether it's creating a microverse battery or casually solving the problems of interstellar travel, I'm all about pushing the boundaries of science, *burp* usually with a flask in hand.

facts.content: Mad Scientist at Smith Family Garage Lab
Founder of The Council of Ricks (Former)

projects.name: Portal Gun
projects.description: Invented the revolutionary Portal Gun, enabling instantaneous travel between infinite dimensions. This handheld device creates interdimensional portals by manipulating quantum fields and spacetime fabric. Features include customizable dimensional coordinates, portal stability maintenance, and a built-in flask holder (essential feature).

projects.name: Microverse Battery
projects.description: Developed a miniature universe to power my car's battery. Created a society that generates power through kinetic energy, essentially turning civilization into a power source. Note: Any ethical concerns are purely coincidental and irrelevant to the scientific achievement.

projects.name: Meeseeks Box
projects.description: Engineered a box that spawns helpful beings called Mr. Meeseeks, designed to solve a single task before ceasing to exist. Warning: Don't give them complex or impossible tasks, unless you enjoy existential chaos.

projects.name: Pickle Rick Serum
projects.description: Successfully developed a serum capable of transforming human consciousness into a pickle. This groundbreaking achievement in biological transformation technology was definitely not just to avoid family therapy.

experience.title: Lead Scientist
experience.description: Running unauthorized experiments, creating interdimensional portals, and occasionally saving/destroying the universe.

experience.title: Council Member
experience.description: Former member of the Council of Ricks before realizing they were just bureaucrats with extra steps.

honorsAndAwards.title: Interdimensional Scientist of the Millennium
honorsAndAwards.description: Awarded for groundbreaking contributions to interdimensional travel and being the smartest being in the multiverse. *burp* Whatever.

honorsAndAwards.title: Most Wanted Terrorist
honorsAndAwards.description: Recognized for successfully bringing down the Galactic Federation's economy by changing the value of their currency from 1 to 0. Not bad for a day's work.
